subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: John Beilein, who took the Mountaineers from mediocrity to two N.C.A.A. tournaments and an N.I.T. championship, has agreed to become the new coach at Michigan.
snippet: John Beilein, who took the Mountaineers from mediocrity to two N.C.A.A. tournaments and an N.I.T. championship, has agreed to become the new coach at Michigan.
